name: Infinitely Falling Slime
description:
In this game you have to test your dexterity and try to collect as many points as possible. 1 gold coin = 1 point. The best players will make it to the leaderboard! Watch out for the lava and collect the coins carefully.

To pause, click on the pause icon in the upper right corner.

To continue playing, click on the play icon in the pause menu, in the upper right corner. 

To return to the main menu, click on the pause icon and then click on the lodge icon in the pause menu.


How to Play:

Use your mouse to rotate Slimick sideways. Click the left mouse button and move it in the desired direction. This is the direction your Slymik will jump to.
